events.name: Click
events.description: When the user clicks the Label control.

events.name: DblClick
events.description: When the user double-clicks the Label control.

events.name: MouseDown
events.description: When the user presses a mouse button while the pointer is over the Label control.

events.name: MouseMove
events.description: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the Label control.

events.name: MouseUp
events.description: When the user releases a mouse button that was pressed while the pointer was over the Label control.

events.name: Resize
events.description: When the size of the Label control changes.
